name: Dreadheart
description:
Oh Dungeon! is a fast-paced dungeon crawler, where your goal is to go into the dungeons and earn gold, so that you can upgrade your character, armor, weapons and stuff.

There of course will be bosses to encounter in the deeps of the dungeons, but that means more gold for you, if you can get out alive.

Controls:

Use Arrow keys to move around.

Space bar for shooting and interactions.

Story behind and forth:

The game is in development by the Team WiST Games, and is made in a genre that we find interesting and fun to work in. The pixel art is of course retro and the style we go with even more, but that's the soul and charm of this game.

Also we worked hard to find a fun a also hard way to increases the gameplay and our way was to make the combat easy but hard to master, you move fast and can only shoot left or right so you will need to plan your attacks.

We are aiming high we know. We are aiming for Steam, and we of course hope you all join us on that journey by following us here on itch and help us, make a great and fun game by helping us test it out.

Early Access and the way to beta will be totally free to play and first when we are aiming towards the steam store there will be put a price tag on. But for now lets have fun and enjoy PC Gaming.
